TopicTitle: How do you mine the water kethane???

Articles.Content:
I found out that the water ones are particularly challenging considering the mechanic that not much of us like I'm sure of Water Kills so stay out of it.

So I thought that if you dropped a KAS winch from a boat or something, Holding the drill but extend the drill then lower it down... but is there a more simple way?

Thanks in advance, Happy flying, Happy mining!
Kethane needs an offshore oil rig drill type of thing. I'm gonna experiment with this. I will post my results later.
